name: Aloe Vera
care_instructions: Water every 3 weeks. Prefers bright, indirect sunlight.
description: Aloe Vera is known for its medicinal properties, especially for treating burns.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
care_instructions: Water weekly, prefers bright, indirect light. Avoid drafts.
description: A popular indoor tree, known for its large, glossy leaves.

name: Spider Plant
care_instructions: Water every 2 weeks, prefers moderate indirect light.
description: Known for its air-purifying properties and attractive arching leaves.

name: Rose
description: A symbol of love, roses come in various colors and sizes.

name: Snake Plant
care_instructions: Water once a month, thrives in low light.
description: A hardy houseplant with upright, sword-shaped leaves.

name: Basil
description: A fragrant herb commonly used in cooking, especially Italian dishes.

name: Cactus
care_instructions: Water once every 3 weeks, prefers full sun.
description: Cacti are low-maintenance plants that thrive in dry, sunny conditions.

name: Lavender
care_instructions: Water weekly, requires full sun and well-drained soil.
description: Known for its beautiful purple flowers and calming fragrance.

name: Peace Lily
care_instructions: Water when soil is dry, moderate to low indirect light.
description: An elegant indoor plant known for its air-purifying abilities.

name: Pothos
care_instructions: Water every 2 weeks, thrives in low to medium light.
description: A popular low-maintenance houseplant with trailing vines and heart-shaped leaves.
